# Class SafetyCheckerFactory

Factory class for creating safety checker instances.

This factory class provides methods for creating instances of safety checkers with various configurations and weights.

##### Index

### Methods

create

## Methods

### `Static`create

  * create(  
embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder),  
config: [SafetyCheckerCreationConfig](/interfaces/primitives_safety_types.SafetyCheckerCreationConfig),  
): Promise<[SafetyChecker](./primitives_safety_safety_checker.SafetyChecker)>

Creates a new safety checker instance.

#### Parameters

    * embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Text embedder for semantic understanding

    * config: [SafetyCheckerCreationConfig](/interfaces/primitives_safety_types.SafetyCheckerCreationConfig)

Configuration for safety checker creation

#### Returns Promise<[SafetyChecker](./primitives_safety_safety_checker.SafetyChecker)>

Promise resolving to a new safety checker instance

#### Throws

InworldError If creation fails
